title.narrative: Validation of the results of the actuarial study for the General Social Insurance Scheme as per Agreement with the Troika and Peer Review for the Actuarial Valuation of the GSIS as of 31 December 2012

description.narrative: Development objective: The project focuses on capacity improvement of the financial governance of the SIS. Immediate objectives: To provide: (a) technical advisory support on the validation of the General Social Insurance Scheme (GSIS) actuarial study, as per Troika's requirements, which would assess the long-term viability of the national pension system; and (b) a peer review of the in-house actuarial report of the GSIS. Outputs: - ILO validation note of the GSIS actuarial study, as per Troika's requirements - part of the MoU. - ILO peer review report of the GSIS 2012 Actuarial report, including recommendations on the improvement of the report and in-house capacities.

transaction.ref: CYP/13/01/CYP-2013-CYP101 - Expertise of Ministry of labour's officials and of social partners is enhanced in the field of the financial , economic and fiscal sustainability of the national social security systems-C
